import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Component } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './App.css'; class App extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ text:'', } } handleButton =(e)=>this.setState({text:this.state.text+e.currentTarget.value}) clearScreen=()=>this.setState({text:''}) showResult=()=>this.setState({text:this.calculateResult(this.state.text)}) calculateResult=(s)=>eval(s) render() { return (
); } } export default App;
